content: i used red heart comfort yarn and a 4mm hook to make most shown in the photo a different yarn and hook size will just alter the finished size of this 2 inch mushroom they will make great keychains they can also be used for cat toys just add a bit of catnip inside i ve been crocheting mushrooms for a few years for my miniature gnome world that i ve been building and promised to one day get a couple patterns up for those who were interested it s taken me a bit time to finally get here but here i am if you re interested in seeing my miniature world visit my miniature s fb page here 1 and my blog here 2 1 https //www facebook com/wherethegnomeslive/ 2 https //www sharonojala com/
